c:capability.name: Scene
c:capability.c:description: Model of a scene, which is a specific instance of a SceneTemplate with context necessary for evaluation

c:attribute.name: created
c:attribute.description: Timestamp that the rule was created

c:attribute.name: modified
c:attribute.description: Timestamp that the rule was last modified

c:attribute.name: template
c:attribute.description: The address of the template this scene was created from.

c:attribute.name: enabled
c:attribute.description: Whether or not this scene is enabled, currently this is tied directly to PREMIUM / BASIC status and may not be changed.

c:attribute.name: notification
c:attribute.description: Whether or not a notification should be fired when this scene is executed.

c:attribute.name: scheduler
c:attribute.description: The id of the associated scheduler.

c:attribute.name: firing
c:attribute.description: True while the scene is being executed, the scene may not be ran again until executing is false, at which point all actions have succeeded or failed.

c:attribute.name: actions
c:attribute.description: The actions associated with this scene.

c:attribute.name: lastFireTime
c:attribute.description: The last time this scene was run.

c:attribute.name: lastFireStatus
c:attribute.description: The actions associated with this scene.
